**Agent monitoring integration missing.**

The TODO at line 157-158 indicates agent information isn't being returned when `include_agents` is true. Users requesting agent info will only see "No agent info available" placeholders.

Integrate with `AgentMonitor` (already available via imports) to retrieve actual agent status for each worktree.

In src/lib.rs around lines 157 to 164, the code always returns "No agent info
available" placeholders instead of real agent statuses when include_agents is
true; use the imported AgentMonitor to query each worktree's agent status and
include that in the formatted line. Update the mapping to, when include_agents
is true, call the appropriate AgentMonitor method (e.g., query by worktree path
or repo id) to get a status/result, handle errors by falling back to a sensible
message, and include the returned status in the format string; if include_agents
is false keep the existing behavior. Ensure any synchronous/async boundaries are
respected (await if needed) and propagate or log errors appropriately while
still returning the joined worktree_info.
